title: Need a header fonts that suggest Magic and Witchcraft
content:
Hello,  
Anyone good any recommendations of fonts that have an old witchcraft/magic feel. Possibly medieval in nature?
author: Rawshock Design

comments.content: For a start, you could have a look on some of the suggestions listed here: [http://typophile.com/node/120153](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414182704/http:/typophile.com/node/120153 "http://typophile.com/node/120153")

I feel I should highlight [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414182704/http:/fontsinuse.com/uses/8544/otfried-preussler-exhibition), which feels like an amazing piece of design. The font is [Joos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414182704/http:/www.typographies.fr/N/joos/joos.html).
